scripts.build:app: browserify app/index.js -t babelify -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > build/bundle.js
scripts.build:embed: browserify app/embed.js -t babelify -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > build/embedapp.js
scripts.build: npm run build:app && npm run build:embed
scripts.bundle:lib: ./node_modules/.bin/browserify --require react --require react-dom --require redux --require "lodash/core" --require superagent --require iframe-resizer --require socket.io-client > ./build/lib.js
scripts.bundle:app:watch: node_modules/.bin/watchify app/index.js --external react-dom --external react --external redux --external "lodash/core"  --external superagent --external socketio-client -t babelify -p livereactload -o build/bundle.js
scripts.bundle:embedapp:watch: node_modules/.bin/watchify app/embed.js --external react-dom --external react --external redux --external "lodash/core" --external superagent -t babelify -o build/embedapp.js
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test mocha --require test/test_helper.js --compilers jsx:babel-register --recursive ./test && npm run check
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run bundle:lib" "node app.js" "npm run bundle:embedapp:watch" "npm run bundle:app:watch"
